content: वितर्कः {@--1@} Argument, reasoning, inference. {@--2@} Guess, conjecture, supposition, belief; शिरीषपुष्पाधिकसौकुमार्यौ बाहू तदीयाविति मे वितर्कः <ls>Ku. 1. 41.</ls> {@--3@} Fancy, thought; <ls>Bh. 3. 45.</ls> {@--4@} Doubt; <ls>Ki. 4. 5</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">13. 2.</ls> {@--5@} Deliberation, discussion. {@--6@} A teacher in divine knowledge.
